title: 2015 Athens Water Festival ORCTU Presentation
content: This year's ORCTU tent at the local Athens Water Festival was a big hit, as families and kids poured into Sandy Creek Park for a day of fun, activities and focus on local conservation efforts. An endless array of people lined up to take part in our presentation of aquatic insects, fly selection and casting instruction. The day was a great success and opportunity for the conservation community and Trout Unlimited to reach out to the future stewards of our waterways and fisheries.
